text:
rcle6 Discuss practical ways in which families and others in the community can support 
the woman during pregnancy, delivery, aft er abortion and in the post-partum period. 
Mention the need for the following:
/lozenge6 Recognising and rapidly responding to emergency/danger signs during pregnancy, 
delivery and the post-partum period
/lozenge6 Accompanying the woman when she goes for delivery
/lozenge6 Providing fi  nancial support for payment of medical fees and supplies
/lozenge6 Providing car
